ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Remind, then, if the reminder benefits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So remind them if reminder is profitable:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So render good counsel if good counsel will avail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Therefore, keep on preaching as long as it is of benefit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore advise, if advising is beneficial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therefore remind in case the reminder profits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore do remind, surely reminding does profit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Therefore remind, if the Reminder profits,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor remind (men), for of use is the reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Remind, if the reminder can be of benefit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore admonish thou; admonition hath surely profited,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So admonish, for admonition is indeed beneficial:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore give admonition in case the admonition profits (the hearer).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therefore remind (men) in case the reminder profits (them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore remind, if the Reminder benefits,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:9] So remind, admonish by the Qur’ān, in case the reminder should be of benefit, to the one whom you might remind, the one mentioned in [the following verse] ‘he [who fears] will be reminded’, in other words, even if it might not be of benefit, for it is of benefit to some but of no benefit to others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore remind (men)) admonish by means of the Qur'an and through Allah, (for of use is the reminder) He says: admonition by means of the Qur'an and through Allah does not benefit except he who fears Allah, i.e. the believer.
